answers.answer: I had the same problem but with cramps .my doctor told me that your body is producing a lot more blood now . So its really important you drink a lot of fluids. And just lie down when you can belly up or on your side if prefferrd .hope it helps

question: Ok so I've had a headache period like cramps and my body just feeling so weak! And I can't get any rest!! This been going on for 5 days!! yesterday I went to the hospital and all they did was put me on the monitors and sent me home I then went into the clinic where I receive prenatal care and instead of checking me or doing anything they prescribed me some medicine for nausea! I don't know what this is or what I should do when I look up my symptoms it automatically pops up preeclampsia!!
title: Don't know what to do
